General.Name: Cuhadaroglu Metal Sanayi ve Pazarlama AS
General.Description: Cuhadaroglu Metal Sanayi ve Pazarlama A.S. manufactures and sells aluminum doors and windows in Turkey and internationally. It offers doors and window, sliding, and facade systems; automatic sliding and revolving doors, and KTS glazed folding door systems, as well as glass accessories; office partition systems; and fire and bullet proof joinery systems, and bomb resistant facades. The company sells its products under the Interal, Interax, Interwall, Intersecure, and Interdigi brands. Cuhadaroglu Metal Sanayi ve Pazarlama A.S. was founded in 1954 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Yakuplu Mh. Hürriyet Bulvari No:6, Istanbul, Turkey, 34524
